history.proof: intros. symmetry. hauto use: plus_reg_l, plus_comm.

exceptions.tactic: intros G r x y H.
intros G' r x y H.

exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "AbelianGroup.plus G (AbelianGroup.class G) ?M2422 ?M2421" in the current goal.
The LHS of H (plus x r) does not match any subterm of the goal

original: intros G r x y H. rewrite <- AbelianGroup.ax1 with (m := AbelianGroup.class G). rewrite H. symmetry.
